activities:
Itrios LLC operates itDuzzit.com (www.itduzzit.com), a hosted cloud integration platform.  Individuals and companies may create an account, providing at a minimum name, company name (if applicable), and email.  Optionally, additional information (e.g. mobile phone number to support SMS notification) may be provided.  For paid accounts, a payment method (credit card number) is collected, and stored at a PCI compliant payment gateway provider (Authorize.net).

itDuzzit.com does not share private information with 3rd parties for marketing purposes, and uses private information solely in support of the account holder's solution integration purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Itrios / itDuzzit.com is a licensee of the TRUSTe privacy program; TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor program.
recoursemech: TRUSTe is the 3rd party dispute mechanism and verification program used by Itrios / itDuzzit.com for compliance with U.S.-EU Safe Harbor.
